name: Manic Raiders
description:
Description
Perform insane stunts while you cruise through the never-ending world of Rider! Grab your motorcycle and start flipping like a maniac!


FEATURES

•Up to 15 Unlockable Bikes.
•5 Special Themes.
•One touch control.
•A Small Tutorial to begin.
•Stats record for the player to know what he’s achieved.
•GameCenter.


Thanks!!!
